mapper.select: SELECT board1_no, board1_title, board1_content, board1_regdate, board1_isshow, member_id FROM board1 WHERE board1_isshow='Y' ORDER BY board1_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board1(board1_title, board1_content, board1_regdate, board1_isshow, member_id) values(#{board1_title},#{board1_content},now(),'Y',#{member_id},)
